QuestData.Title: A Favor for Mr. Shackle
QuestData.Description:
Throm'ka, $c. My name is Seska. I represent a... trading company. As you can see, I've fallen victim to these giants and their naga allies.
Three of my associates were also captured while surveying this cove. I'm certain that my employer, Mr. Shackle, would be most grateful if you could procure their release.
QuestData.LogDescription: Free Cleave Thunderhill, Gentle Rosh, and Grace the Green.
QuestData.RewardText:
Excellent, my good $g sir:lady;. I cannot thank you enough for the freedom of my people. Rosh is especially appreciative.
<Gentle Rosh grunts.>
Perhaps you and I can do some more business together.
